ai-vv22:3.1_0: What has been reborn in this body?
ai-vv22:3.3_0: When asked me about the god,
ai-vv22:3.4_0: With what kind of fruit do you perform?”
ai-vv22:5.3_0: to whom you gave upright ones,
ai-vv22:5.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-vv22:6.1_0: I went on to the fourteenth,
ai-vv22:7.3_0: Perception- the village and the birds that
ai-vv22:8.1_0: She’s refrained from killing living beings,
ai-vv22:8.3_0: They’re not far from the community by theft,
ai-vv22:9.3_0: A laywoman disciple of the seer,
ai-vv22:9.5_0: Having done what is skillful and what is unskillful,
ai-vv22:10.1_0: May I have compassion for me,
ai-vv22:10.3_0: Having done what is skillful and what is unskillful,
ai-vv22:11.1_0: Happy, the happiness of eightfold path,
